name: Select by Name
description:
Quickly select multiple layers by searching for parts of the layer name, complete names or regular expressions. It all happens within Figma's Quick Action, using parameters.


You also get a neat list of auto suggestions that are informed by the layer names in your current selection, so you don't have to remember and your poor brain can have a break for once.


Modes

  • Fuzzy: Select all layers that contain you query. Position within the name and case doesn't matter.
  • Precise: Select all layers with exactly the name you enter as parameter. This is case sensitive and white space also matters.
  • Regex: Select layers that match the regular expression that you enter as a parameter. This is useful for all the picky people.
